attributes.description: Just take a look at this spectacular 7 series BMW. This is as luxurious as it gets. From massaging seats to remote control parking, this car has every feature that you can think of and more. Exceptional performance and unmatched luxury combine to make this 750i truly and amazing experience. This BMW is in immaculate condition with a full service history and is a car that has to be seen. Just some of the features include: Navigation, sunroof, heads up display, massaging, heated and ventilated seats, 360 degree surround view cameras, remote parking, park assist, soft close doors, ambient interior lighting, driving assist plus, harman/kardon surround sound, rear entertainment system with tablet, BMW night vision, M sport package, Ambient air package, BMW laserlight, M aerodynamic kit, Anthracite roof lining, BMW individual cool box, BMW carbon core and more
